title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
summary: Harry discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
summary: Bilbo Baggins goes on a journey with dwarves to reclaim treasure from a dragon.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
summary: A shepherd boy travels in search of treasure and finds deeper meaning in life.
